description:
Suspicious of her master’s strange behavior, Kan`u sends a messenger to ask Hakufu for help. Meanwhile, Ryomou’s dip in a peaceful hot spring is interrupted by Ryofu!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Do Unto Others, Do Not Let Them Do Unto You
Hito o Itashite Hito ni Itasarezu
Kontrolliere deinen Gegner, lass dich nicht von ihm kontrollieren.
人を致して人に致されず
